## fromEventObservable() function

Creates event observable logic that listens to an observable that delivers event objects.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function fromEventObservable<T extends EventObject, TInput>(lazyObservable: ({ input, system }: {
    input: TInput;
    system: AnyActorSystem;
    self: ObservableActorRef<T>;
}) => Subscribable<T>): ObservableActorLogic<T, TInput>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  lazyObservable | ({ input, system }: { input: TInput; system: [AnyActorSystem](./xstate.anyactorsystem.md)<></>; self: ObservableActorRef&lt;T&gt;; }) =&gt; [Subscribable](./xstate.subscribable.md)<></>&lt;T&gt; | A function that creates an observable |

**Returns:**

[ObservableActorLogic](./xstate.observableactorlogic.md)<></>&lt;T, TInput&gt;

Event observable logic
